effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
